TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtensionFx35 extends System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtension

summary.span: 为 XML 架构元素声明生成到 .NET Framework 类型的内部映射。

span.span: Generates internal mappings to .NET Framework types for XML schema element declarations.

summary.span: 扩展 ，以便向为 .NET Framework 3.5 版创建的类型化数据集提供其他功能。

span.span: Expands upon to provide additional functionality for typed datasets created for .NET Framework version 3.5.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtensionFx35` 调用的受保护构造函数为.NET Framework 3.5 版生成类型化数据集并启用 LINQ to DataSet 和分层更新。`System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtensionFx35` calls the protected constructor of to generate typed datasets for the .NET Framework version 3.5 and enable LINQ to DataSet and hierarchical update. > [!NOTE] > LINQ to DataSet 和分层更新是中的新增功能[!INCLUDE[vs_orcas_long](~/includes/vs-orcas-long-md.md)]。LINQ to DataSet and hierarchical update are features that were added in [!INCLUDE[vs_orcas_long](~/includes/vs-orcas-long-md.md)]. > > 另请参阅[分层更新概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c4f8e8b9-e4a5-4a02-8462-d03d1e8222d6)并[LINQ to DataSet](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/linq-to-dataset.md)。Also see [Hierarchical Update Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c4f8e8b9-e4a5-4a02-8462-d03d1e8222d6) and [LINQ to DataSet](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/linq-to-dataset.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 进行了扩展.NET Framework 版本 3.5 的类型化数据集提供其他功能。Expands upon to provide additional functionality for typed datasets for .NET Framework version 3.5. 调用的受保护构造函数为.NET Framework 3.5 版生成类型化数据集并启用 LINQ to DataSet 和分层更新。 calls the protected constructor of to generate typed datasets for .NET Framework version 3.5 and enable LINQ to DataSet and hierarchical update. > [!NOTE] > LINQ to Dataset 和分层更新是中的功能[!INCLUDE[vs_orcas_long](~/includes/vs-orcas-long-md.md)]。LINQ to Dataset and hierarchical update are features in [!INCLUDE[vs_orcas_long](~/includes/vs-orcas-long-md.md)]. 请参阅[LINQ to DataSet](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/linq-to-dataset.md)并[分层更新概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c4f8e8b9-e4a5-4a02-8462-d03d1e8222d6)。See [LINQ to DataSet](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/linq-to-dataset.md) and [Hierarchical Update Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c4f8e8b9-e4a5-4a02-8462-d03d1e8222d6).
